page.title: 06NET MAKING
page.content: The "Caley Fisheries Net Store"which is situated at 11 Harbour Street has now been going for 20 years.The founders of the"Caley"Mr Rob Forman, Dr Taylor & George Baird (Managing Director)founded the "Caley"50 years ago then 30 years later they decided to begin a net store.The most popular type of net is the Seine net which takes 3 days to make.The materials they use are netting,grass rope,floats,lead weights,terline ropes,wire ropes,nylon twine & curline twine.The net store has 14 staff and they work 40 hours a week normally mending nets,but they also make new nets for boats & safety nets for building sights.
